title: Can't Buy Champions/Shop Content even with enough IP
body:
I have 6389 IP but I can't buy anything at all, I played a game after noticing this like most people say too do but I still can't. I solved this before by doing the same thing and gaining IP does not work anymore as a workaround apparently.

Restarted the Client 3 times to see if that worked, didn't.

What the hell do I do, I just wanna buy {{champion:136}} man

replies.body:
This is a fairly rare bug that crops up on the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen to complete the purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Please let me know if this worked for you.
Right after I posted I remembered you can swap and just bought Sol that way, it worked, thanks for the reply!
